name: browser_base
description: Browser automation (Browserbase or similar). Headless browser for web scraping, form filling, and navigation.
constraints: No login/session persistence; each run is a fresh browser. Use for public pages, form submissions, screenshots.

name: discord_agent
description: Discord integration. Post messages to channels, read channel history, manage reactions, send DMs.
constraints: Requires Discord bot token and guild/channel IDs. Use for community updates, announcements, and listening to ideas channels.

name: gmail_agent
description: Gmail API integration. Send and read emails, search inbox, manage labels, draft messages.
constraints: Requires OAuth or service account. Use for outreach, drip campaigns, and email-based notifications.

name: linkedin_agent
description: LinkedIn automation. Post updates, view connections, send connection requests or InMails (within API limits).
constraints: Subject to LinkedIn API/ToS limits. Use for B2B outreach and thought leadership posts.
